about_the_game:
Driving a drone with a Keyboard, destroying 101 targets with an onboard machine gun and missile.

Targets also attack and destroy the drone of the player in various ways.

The number of missiles mounted on the drone increases one by one for each destruction of targets with a machine gun.

The battlefield is divided into five stages,

Stage 1 focuses on a training process that allows users to handle drones well and gather missing files while destroying 20 targets, so it can pass without difficulty. However, caution is required because it gives damage to drones in various ways.

(In stage 1, it can only be destroyed by finding a brightly shining target and shooting until the target's energy is zero.)

Stage 2 requires one huge monster to be knocked down. It is possible with machine guns, but it is very advantageous to use the missing file collected in stage 1.

Stage 3 requires destroying 10 airplanes. It is a method of defeating one by one by one.

Airplanes cannot win if they find weaknesses in attacking drones by software programs and fail to attack them properly.

Stage 4 requires the destruction of 20 enemy drones and 5 turrets. The five turrets are so destructive that they must be destroyed first by using the missing file at the risk of the player's damage. If there is no missing file, the enemy drone must be destroyed and the turret must be destroyed by obtaining the missing file. Enemy drones that meet the conditions attack the player's drone at once.

Stage 5 can only be won by entering the airborne monster base and destroying more than 45 of the 50 monsters. The 50 monsters appear and disappear repeatedly, so there is no distinction between destroyed and destroyed. Once destroyed, you can never destroy. Therefore, remembering what you destroyed is the secret to victory.

When the energy of the player drone becomes zero while playing 1-5 stages, return to the beginning of stage 1 and start playing again from the beginning.

The operation button of the keyboard and the method of play are always displayed on the screen when the speed of the player drone is stopped to zero. 

Let's not give up and let's win because it's built to win if we repeat the play.

name: Drone Fire
short_description: Drive the drone on the keyboard and destroy the target. Targets also attack the drone in many ways. Weapons of the drone include machine guns and missiles. Each time you destroy the target with a machine gun, another missile is created.
